page.title: 25Turville : TV Tourism and Other Changes
page.content:
Turville has achieved world-wide fame as the setting for the popular TV comdey series "The Vicar of Dibley". It has also featured in many other TV productions and feature films including "Chitty Chitty Bang Bang". As a result, many overseas visitors come to see both the church and the village.

The old school is now a successful nursery.

Many houses in the village are now either second homes or let on short term leases.
Ray Jones
